crosspoison.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

crushgrip.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.

curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.

darkestlariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

dazzlinggleam.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

decorate.desc: Sharply raises the target's Attack and Special Attack stats.

destinybond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.

detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

devastatingdrake.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

diamondstorm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.

dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move.

disarmingvoice.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

dragondarts.desc: In singles, this move hits the target twice. In doubles, this move hits each target once.

dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.

eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.

electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.

electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.

electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.

encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.

endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.

fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.

fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.

faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.

If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Serene Grace Ability. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.

The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.

flail.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.

flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.

flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.

flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

fleurcannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon

fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.

floatyfall.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.

flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.

fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

fly.name: Fly

flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.

followme.name: Follow Me

forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
forcepalm.name: Force Palm

foresight.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.

forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).
forestscurse.name: Forest's Curse

foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.

freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.

freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

freezyfrost.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant

frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
frostbreath.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.
frostbreath.name: Frost Breath

frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
frustration.name: Frustration

furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
furyattack.name: Fury Attack

furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.
furycutter.name: Fury Cutter

furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes

fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare.
fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt

fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt.
fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare

futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.
futuresight.name: Future Sight

gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or Zen Mode, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid

geargrind.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
geargrind.name: Gear Grind

gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
gearup.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
gearup.name: Gear Up

genesissupernova.desc: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.
genesissupernova.name: Genesis Supernova

geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.
geomancy.name: Geomancy

gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
gigadrain.name: Giga Drain

gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact

gigavolthavoc.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
gigavolthavoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc

glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
glaciate.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
glaciate.name: Glaciate

glitzyglow.desc: This move summons Light Screen for 5 turns upon use.
glitzyglow.name: Glitzy Glow

gmaxbefuddle.desc: Sleeps, poisons, or paralyzes opponent(s). Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxbefuddle.shortDesc: Foes: SLP/PSN/PAR. BP scales with base move.
gmaxbefuddle.name: G-Max Befuddle

gmaxcentiferno.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxcentiferno.shortDesc: Traps/damages foes. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxcentiferno.name: G-Max Centiferno

gmaxchistrike.desc: Applies Focus Energy to the user and its allies. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxchistrike.shortDesc: User side: Focus Energy. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxchistrike.name: G-Max Chi Strike

gmaxcuddle.desc: Infatuates opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxcuddle.shortDesc: Infatuates opponents. BP scales with base move.
gmaxcuddle.name: G-Max Cuddle

gmaxdepletion.desc: Lowers the PP of the opponent(s) last used move. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxdepletion.shortDesc: Foe: Lowers PP of last move. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxdepletion.name: G-Max Depletion

gmaxfinale.desc: Heals user and allies for 1/6 of their post-Gigantamax max HP. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxfinale.shortDesc: Heals user and allies. BP scales with base move.
gmaxfinale.name: G-Max Finale

gmaxfoamburst.desc: Lowers the Speed of opponents by 2 stages. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxfoamburst.shortDesc: Foes: -2 Speed. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxfoamburst.name: G-Max Foam Burst

gmaxgoldrush.desc: Confuses opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxgoldrush.shortDesc: Confuses foes. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxgoldrush.name: G-Max Gold Rush

gmaxgravitas.desc: Summons Gravity. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxgravitas.shortDesc: Summons Gravity. BP scales with base move.
gmaxgravitas.name: G-Max Gravitas

gmaxmalodor.desc: Poisons opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxmalodor.shortDesc: Poisons opponents. BP scales with base move.
gmaxmalodor.name: G-Max Malodor

gmaxmeltdown.desc: Applies Torment to opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxmeltdown.shortDesc: Applies Torment to foes. BP scales with base move.
gmaxmeltdown.name: G-Max Meltdown

gmaxreplenish.desc: Has a 50% chance of restoring all Berries on the user's side. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxreplenish.shortDesc: 50% restore berries. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxreplenish.name: G-Max Replenish

gmaxresonance.desc: Summons Aurora Veil. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxresonance.shortDesc: Summons Aurora Veil. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxresonance.name: G-Max Resonance

gmaxsandblast.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxsandblast.shortDesc: Traps/damages foes. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxsandblast.name: G-Max Sandblast

gmaxsmite.desc: Confuses opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxsmite.shortDesc: Confuses opponents. BP scales with base move.
gmaxsmite.name: G-Max Smite

gmaxsnooze.desc: Has a 50% chance of applying Yawn to the target. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxsnooze.shortDesc: 50% Yawn chance. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxsnooze.name: G-Max Snooze

gmaxsteelsurge.desc: Sets a Steel-type entry hazard. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxsteelsurge.shortDesc: Sets Steel entry hazard. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxsteelsurge.name: G-Max Steelsurge

gmaxstonesurge.desc: Sets Stealth Rock. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxstonesurge.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock. BP scales w/ base move's BP.
gmaxstonesurge.name: G-Max Stonesurge

gmaxstunshock.desc: Opponents are each randomly paralyzed or poisoned. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxstunshock.shortDesc: Foe(s): Par/Psn. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxstunshock.name: G-Max Stun Shock

gmaxsweetness.desc: Cures status on user's team. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxsweetness.shortDesc: Cures team's statuses. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxsweetness.name: G-Max Sweetness

gmaxtartness.desc: Lowers opponents' evasion by 1 stage. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxtartness.shortDesc: Foe(s): -1 evasion. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxtartness.name: G-Max Tartness

gmaxterror.desc: Traps opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxterror.shortDesc: Traps foe(s). BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxterror.name: G-Max Terror

gmaxvolcalith.desc: Damages opponent(s) by 1/8 of their maximum HP for four turns. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxvolcalith.shortDesc: Damages foes for 4 turns. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxvolcalith.name: G-Max Volcalith

gmaxvoltcrash.desc: Paralyzes opponents. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxvoltcrash.shortDesc: Paralyzes foe(s). BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxvoltcrash.name: G-Max Volt Crash

gmaxwildfire.desc: Damages non-Fire-type opponent(s) by 1/6 of their maximum HP for four turns. Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxwildfire.shortDesc: Damages foes for 4 turns. BP scales w/ base move.
gmaxwildfire.name: G-Max Wildfire

gmaxwindrage.desc: Removes Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Mist, Safeguard, G-Max Steelsurge, and Terrains from the field. This move's Base Power scales with the base move's Base Power.
gmaxwindrage.shortDesc: Clears field. BP scales with base move's BP.
gmaxwindrage.name: G-Max Wind Rage

grassknot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.
grassknot.name: Grass Knot

grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.
grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge

grasswhistle.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle

grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain

gravapple.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. This move's base power is 1.5x stronger in Gravity.
gravapple.name: Grav Apple

gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
gravity.shortDesc: For 5 turns, negates all Ground immunities.
gravity.name: Gravity

growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
growl.name: Growl

growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
growth.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.
growth.name: Growth

grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.
grudge.name: Grudge

guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
guardianofalola.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.
guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola

guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
guardsplit.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.
guardsplit.name: Guard Split

guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
guardswap.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.
guardswap.name: Guard Swap

guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
guillotine.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
guillotine.name: Guillotine

gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot

gust.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
gust.shortDesc: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.
gust.name: Gust

gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
gyroball.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.
gyroball.name: Gyro Ball

hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
hail.name: Hail

hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm

harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
harden.name: Harden

haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
haze.name: Haze

headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
headbutt.name: Headbutt

headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headcharge.name: Head Charge

headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
headsmash.name: Head Smash

healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured.
healbell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
healbell.name: Heal Bell

healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
healblock.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.
healblock.name: Heal Block

healingwish.desc: The user faints and the next injured or statused Pokemon brought in has its HP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. The healing happens before hazards take effect. Is not consumed if the Pokemon sent out is not injured or statused. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.
healingwish.name: Healing Wish

healorder.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
healorder.name: Heal Order

healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
healpulse.name: Heal Pulse

heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp

heartswap.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
heartswap.shortDesc: Swaps all stat changes with target.
heartswap.name: Heart Swap

heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heatcrash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.
heatcrash.name: Heat Crash

heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
heatwave.name: Heat Wave

heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
heavyslam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.
heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam

helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.
helpinghand.name: Helping Hand

hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a major status condition.
hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.
hex.name: Hex

hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.
hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power

highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick

holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.name: Hold Back

holdhands.desc: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
holdhands.name: Hold Hands

honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
honeclaws.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
honeclaws.name: Hone Claws

horndrill.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
horndrill.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
horndrill.name: Horn Drill

hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

hornleech.name: Horn Leech

howl.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.
howl.name: Howl

hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.
hurricane.name: Hurricane

hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon

hydrovortex.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
hydrovortex.name: Hydro Vortex

hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam

hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.
hyperfang.name: Hyper Fang

hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.
hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury

hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.
hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole

hypervoice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice

hypnosis.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
hypnosis.name: Hypnosis

iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends.
iceball.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
iceball.name: Ice Ball

icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
iceburn.name: Ice Burn

icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.
icefang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.
icefang.name: Ice Fang

icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
icehammer.name: Ice Hammer

icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
icepunch.name: Ice Punch

iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash

iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear

icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
icywind.name: Icy Wind

imprison.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.
imprison.name: Imprison

incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
incinerate.name: Incinerate

inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
inferno.name: Inferno

infernooverdrive.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
infernooverdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive

infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
infestation.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
infestation.name: Infestation

ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. mysticalfire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire

nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
nastyplot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot

naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.
naturalgift.name: Natural Gift

naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).
naturepower.name: Nature Power

naturesmadness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
naturesmadness.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.
naturesmadness.name: Nature's Madness

needlearm.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
needlearm.name: Needle Arm

neverendingnightmare.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
neverendingnightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare

nightdaze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
nightdaze.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
nightdaze.name: Night Daze

nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.
nightmare.name: Nightmare

nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.
nightshade.name: Night Shade

nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
nightslash.name: Night Slash

nobleroar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
nobleroar.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.
nobleroar.name: Noble Roar

noretreat.desc: The user raises each of its stats by one stage, but it is prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Can only be used once while on the field.
noretreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.
noretreat.name: No Retreat

nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.name: Nuzzle

oblivionwing.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
oblivionwing.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.
oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing

obstruct.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Defense lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
obstruct.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -2 Def.
obstruct.name: Obstruct

octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
octazooka.name: Octazooka

octolock.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field. At the end of every turn, the target's Defense and Special defense stats are lowered by 1 stage.
octolock.shortDesc: Foe can't switch. Lowers Def and SpD every turn.
octolock.name: Octolock

odorsleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth

ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind

originpulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
originpulse.name: Origin Pulse

outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.
outrage.name: Outrage

overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
overheat.name: Overheat

painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

paleowave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
paleowave.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
paleowave.name: Paleo Wave

paraboliccharge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
paraboliccharge.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge

partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.
partingshot.name: Parting Shot

payback.desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.
payback.name: Payback

perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.
perishsong.name: Perish Song

petalblizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.
petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard

petaldance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.
petaldance.name: Petal Dance

phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
phantomforce.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.
phantomforce.name: Phantom Force

photongeyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
photongeyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser

pikapapow.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
pikapapow.name: Pika Papow

pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
pinmissile.name: Pin Missile

plasmafists.desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists

playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playnice.name: Play Nice

playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
playrough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
playrough.name: Play Rough

pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.
pluck.name: Pluck

poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.name: Poison Fang

poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonjab.name: Poison Jab

poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poisonsting.name: Poison Sting

poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.
poisontail.name: Poison Tail

pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.

powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
powder.shortDesc: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.
powder.name: Powder

powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
powdersnow.name: Powder Snow

powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
powersplit.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.
powersplit.name: Power Split

powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
powerswap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.
powerswap.name: Power Swap

powertrick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.

poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

precipiceblades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
protect.name: Protect

psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.name: Psybeam

psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.
psychup.name: Psych Up

psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.
psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs

psychicterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.
psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain

psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost

psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
psychocut.name: Psycho Cut

psychoshift.desc: The user's major status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no major status condition or if the target already has one.
psychoshift.shortDesc: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.
psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift

psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.
psyshock.name: Psyshock

psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.
psystrike.name: Psystrike

psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

psywave.name: Psywave

punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.
punishment.name: Punishment

purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a major status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
purify.shortDesc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.
purify.name: Purify

pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDesc: Power doubles if a foe is switching out.
pursuit.name: Pursuit

pyroball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.
quash.name: Quash

quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.
quickguard.name: Quick Guard

quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
quiverdance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

rage.desc: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.

ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
ragepowder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
ragepowder.name: Rage Powder

raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.
raindance.name: Rain Dance

rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.
rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin

razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.
razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf

razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
razorshell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
razorshell.name: Razor Shell

razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
razorwind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.
razorwind.name: Razor Wind

recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.
recycle.name: Recycle

reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.
reflect.name: Reflect

reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
reflecttype.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.
reflecttype.name: Reflect Type

refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.
refresh.name: Refresh

relicsong.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.
relicsong.name: Relic Song

rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any major status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.
rest.name: Rest

retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.
retaliate.name: Retaliate

return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
return.name: Return

revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
revelationdance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.
revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance

revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.
revenge.name: Revenge

reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.
reversal.name: Reversal

roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.

roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
rockblast.name: Rock Blast

rockclimb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
rockclimb.name: Rock Climb

rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
rocksmash.name: Rock Smash

rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb

rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker

roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
roleplay.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.
roleplay.name: Role Play

rollingkick.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.
rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick

rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends.
rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
rollout.name: Rollout

roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.

safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.

Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.

stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.

storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.

stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.

strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

stuffcheeks.desc: Consumes berry and raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
